items.title: Would you take a $120,000 pay cut to work from home full time?

items.title: Jake Paul-Anthony Joshua fight almost cost DraftKings $100 million. Everyday bettors lost instead.
items.description: Sportsbooks have been having a tough year — but the Paul-Joshua fight was a good night for the house.

items.title: Too many people forgot their RMDs last year. Don’t make this ‘billion-dollar mistake.’

items.title: Logan Paul’s $5.3 million Pokémon bet raises a bigger question: Do collectibles belong in your portfolio?
items.description: Collectibles may offer eye-catching returns, but not all financial experts are on board.

items.title: ‘Is this really what college bowl games have become?’: Critics say goofy Pop-Tarts and Duke’s Mayo sponsorships are overshadowing the football
items.description: Notre Dame decided to pass up an invitation to play in the Pop-Tarts Bowl, which is set for Saturday
